properties.name: Carolina Classic Softball Tournament in Charlotte
properties.description: Posted by Kward7

properties.name: Cincinnati Classic
properties.description: Posted by Kward7Cincinatti Classic was the fist tournament that i ever traveled to besides in North Carolina (where im from). I was only 13 years old.

properties.name: Denver Colorado Tournament
properties.description: Posted by Kward7This was a softball tournament in Denver, there was nearly 200 teams in this tournament, we finished 16th.

properties.name: Ft. Lauderdale Rising Star Tournament
properties.description: Posted by Kward7This is actually a tournement that i played in when i was a junior in highschool and my tennessee coached first came and watched me play. S if it wasn\'t for this tournament, i wouldn\'t have come to tennessee.

properties.name: Lafayette Super World Series!
properties.description: Posted by Kward7When i was only 14 years old, i went to Lafayette India and played in what they called the Super World Series. and this was awesome because we ended winning the whole entire tournament, and were technically the "world champions", it was really cute.

properties.name: Seattle's Best ASA softball tournament
properties.description: Posted by Kward7This is where i played with a team in Washington, i had never been there before, and i had never met a single person on the team. My coaches knew their coach, and sent me out there so that i could be recruited.

properties.name: Softball Tournament in Corona
properties.description: Posted by Kward7

properties.name: USC
properties.description: Posted by Kward7This is where i proabably pitched the best game of my life, at the Universty of South Carolina. This tournament was alot of fun, it was actually just about a month ago.

properties.name: University of Arkansas
properties.description: Posted by Kward7I played at the university of Arkansas about 2 months ago. We won 2 out of the 3 games.

properties.name: Universtiy of Alabama
properties.description: Posted by Kward7This is where i played my first college SEC games. We won 1 and lost 2, i really didn\'t play that well. The Alabama fans were awful.
